newsitem.title: INDIA: India's ad hoc t-bills within ceiling, says RBI.
newsitem.headline: India's ad hoc t-bills within ceiling, says RBI.

text.p: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) said the net issue of ad hoc treasury bills on March 27, 1997, was 16.70 billion rupees over the March 31, 1996 level.
It said the net issue of ad hocs as on March 21, 1997, was 39.65 billion rupees.
"Thus, the net issue of ad hocs has been below the 'within the year' and 'year-end' ceilings of 90.0 billion rupees and 50.0 billion rupees, resepctively," RBI said in a statement.
